buyPolitikoz.title: Buy a Politikoz
buyPolitikoz.description: By buying a Politikoz, you secure your participation in the monthly draws forever, with the opportunity to win amazing rewards.
buyPolitikoz.step2Text: Register your political party for auto entry.
buyPolitikoz.step3Text: More Politikoz means more chances to win.

buyKoz.header: Get Your KOZ Tokens: Swap Now!
buyKoz.title: Get KOZ Token
buyKoz.description: KOZ tokens give you access to platform utility and voting power in our future DAO, shaping the platform's future.
buyKoz.step3Text: Use KOZ to get entries for the election draws.

engageAndEarn.header: No Cost, No Risk: Join for Free!
engageAndEarn.title: Engage and Earn
engageAndEarn.description: Engage with our community to earn KOZ Tokens and exchange them for entries to the monthly election draws at no cost.
engageAndEarn.step1Text: Link your X and Discord to our platform.
engageAndEarn.step2Text: Engage to earn KOZ Tokens as rewards.
engageAndEarn.step3Text: Use KOZ Tokens to enter the monthly election draw.

stakeAndWin.header: No Cost, No Risk: Join for Free!
stakeAndWin.title: Stake and Win
stakeAndWin.description: Stake your ADA with us and earn tickets for the monthly draws while still earning your regular ADA rewards.
stakeAndWin.step1Text: Start by connecting your wallet to our platform.
stakeAndWin.step2Text: Stake your ADA in our PLKOZ stake pool.
stakeAndWin.step3Text: More ADA staked means more free entries for draws.

topBanner.text: JOIN THE WORLD OF KOZ NOW. COLLECT, TRADE AND EARN ADA.

Config.title: Auto Link Configuration
Config.description: The Auto Link feature allows you to automatically distribute your tickets based on predefined settings before each election. This ensures your tickets are allocated efficiently without manual intervention. Adjust the distribution according to your strategy and let the system handle the allocation for you.

DeleteConfirm.title: Confirm Deletion
DeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this {type} configuration {id}?

Distribution.frontmanDescription: Assign tickets between standard FRONTMAN and FRONTMAN BOOSTED ELECTION ONLY. The boosted version will only be used in elections with boosted rewards. Combined allocation cannot exceed 100%.

ModalRandom.title: Configure Random Distribution
ModalRandom.description: Configure the percentage of tickets that will be automatically distributed to random Politikoz before each election. This ensures your unassigned tickets are always put to use.

ModalParty.title: Configure Party Distribution
ModalParty.description: Configure the percentage of tickets that will be automatically distributed to your party members before each election. This allows you to support your party's Politikoz and increase their chances of winning, strengthening your party's position in the electoral race.

ModalPolitikoz.title: Link to Specific Politikoz
ModalPolitikoz.description: Configure percentage distribution for specific Politikoz. The selected percentage will be equally distributed among all selected Politikoz. You can only add percentages - to reduce, delete the configuration.

BuyTicket.title: Buy Tickets
BuyTicket.minimumFeeInfo: Minimum service fee 2.5 ADA (includes 3 FREE tickets)
BuyTicket.minimumFeeTooltip: The first 2.5 ADA covers up to 25 tickets and includes 3 FREE tickets. After that, +0.1 ADA per additional ticket.

ClaimKoz.title: Claim KOZ Rewards
ClaimKoz.description: Claim your available KOZ tokens accumulated through platform activities.

ElectionResult.groupOutOfStamina: ‚ö†Ô∏è Winning Position (if election ended now) - Out of Stamina for Next Wave
ElectionResult.title: Election Results

GovernanceSettings.title: Governance Settings
GovernanceSettings.ticketBoostDescription: Each ticket type has a unique power boost effect. When linked to a Politikoz, it enhances their voting capabilities, increasing their chances of winning elections.
GovernanceSettings.votingPowerDescription: Your voting power is based on the amount of KOZ tokens you hold. In future updates, this power will be used to vote on changes to the governance settings.
GovernanceSettings.potShareDescription: This setting defines the portion of the election pot that will be distributed in each election round.
GovernanceSettings.electionPotDescription: This section defines how the Election Pot is distributed among the elected positions and ticket roles. Each category receives a percentage of the total pot, which corresponds to a specific ADA value per election.
GovernanceSettings.ticketLimitsDescription: These limits define the minimum and maximum ADA range that the balancing engine can work within to determine how much stake is needed to earn 1 ticket of each type. Based on staking conditions, the engine picks a value within this range. For example, if the engine picks 2000 ADA for Corrupt, a delegator with 5000 ADA gets 2 Corrupt tickets. Remaining stake is passed to the next type: Lobbyist ‚Üí Briber ‚Üí Launderer, continuing until no ticket can be assigned.
GovernanceSettings.ticketLimitsCurrent: Current value selected by engine: {amount} ADA
GovernanceSettings.intervalDescription: Defines the interval needed for the next election. If set to 1, an election will occur every epoch.
GovernanceSettings.luckDescription: Determines the number of digits a user must choose as the lucky number assigned to each Politikoz.
GovernanceSettings.jailDescription: Defines the percentage chance of a Politikoz being sent to jail after being elected.
GovernanceSettings.bailDescription: Defines the cost (in KOZ) to pay per sentenced epoch in order to leave jail before the random sentence period ends.
GovernanceSettings.bestDayDescription: Defines the preferred day of the week to start a new election cycle.
GovernanceSettings.waveSettingsDescription: Each wave represents a stage in the election process with specific rules like number precision, bonuses, stamina requirements, and timing intervals before execution.
GovernanceSettings.politikozDescription: Defines how many Politikoz of each role will be elected in each election and calculates the ADA share per elected role based on the distribution settings.
GovernanceSettings.ticketDescription: Defines the number of ticket-based roles that will be elected in each election and calculates the ADA share per elected ticket based on the distribution settings.

PolitikozProfile.frontmenDesc: Frontman take the fall while real leaders hide.

Stake.stakeDescription: Stake your ADA with our pool to earn rewards and support the Politikoz ecosystem.
Stake.title: Stake Your ADA with PLKOZ
Stake.description: When you join our PLKOZ pool, you can earn ADA rewards like any other pool. Additionally, you'll get tickets and KOZ token that let you participate in a monthly lottery for a chance to win more ADA and further increase your earnings.
Stake.kozRewardsMessage: You can claim up to {amount} KOZ rewards through monthly claims

collateralModal.title: What is Collateral?
collateralModal.description: Collateral is a small amount of ADA (usually 5 ADA) that your wallet holds separately. It's required for smart contract transactions on Cardano.
collateralModal.explanation: Think of it as a security deposit that ensures smart contract transactions work properly. Don't worry - you keep full control of this ADA!
collateralModal.walletInfo: Your wallet automatically manages this for you, and you can get it back anytime by removing the collateral setting in your wallet.

AuthModal.title: Verify Wallet
AuthModal.description: Please sign with your wallet to continue
AuthModal.walletPrompt: No transaction or fees - just a signature
AuthModal.sessionInfo: Valid for 1 hour before another signature is needed

tiers.waitForNextWave: Thank you for your participation. A new wave of tiers will be available soon. Stay tuned!
tiers.modalDescription: Complete tiers to supercharge the next election! When a tier is filled, its BOOST prize adds to the Frontman ticket jackpot, and the election moves to the next cardano epoch - making winner even bigger winner, even sooner! üèÜ
tiers.clickToViewAllTiers: Click to view all tiers and prize details
tiers.earlyCompletionNote: If tier completes today, election starts earlier

Team.title: Meet the Team
Team.description: Our passionate and focused team may be small, but we are deeply rooted in the Cardano Blockchain ecosystem. As ADA investors since 2019 and founders of the Politikoz NFT project in 2021, our vision goes far beyond NFTs ‚Äî we aim to deliver long-term value to our community.
Team.uxuiDesc: Pixel Art Design, UI/UX, User Testing.
Team.fullstackDesc: Backend (Java), Frontend (Next.js), PostgreSQL Database, AWS Developer.
Team.infraDesc: Server Management, Stake Pool Operator, Infrastructure, System Testing.

TicketPolicy.calculatorDescription: Enter your staking amount to simulate how many tickets you would receive per tier and see your bonus reward in KOZ.
TicketPolicy.bonusMessage: You will receive a bonus of {amount} KOZ, claimable monthly.
TicketPolicy.exampleIntro: Suppose a delegator has 12,000 ADA staked:
TicketPolicy.exampleLine2: Remaining: 2,000 ADA ‚Üí Not enough for 1 Lobbyist (requires 3,000 ADA)
TicketPolicy.exampleLine3: Move to next tier: 2 Briber tickets (2 √ó 1000)
TicketPolicy.exampleLine4: Remaining: 0 ADA ‚Üí No Launderer ticket awarded
TicketPolicy.exampleNote: The system always follows the order: Corrupt ‚Üí Lobbyist ‚Üí Briber ‚Üí Launderer and rolls down remaining ADA.
TicketPolicy.policyExplanation: This policy defines how much ADA is needed to earn one ticket of each type. The distribution engine works in a tiered order starting from
TicketPolicy.policyRollover: When a delegator‚Äôs stake is not enough for the current tier, the remaining ADA is carried over to the next one.
TicketPolicy.nextRebalance: Next Ticket Policy Rebalance at epoch

TicketProfile.ticketDescription: Provides a {boostPercentage}% boost in votes for the linked Politikoz and has a chance to earn {adaReward} ADA if elected.
TicketProfile.linkTicketsDescription: Select a ticket to link with your account.
TicketProfile.dynamicTicket: Provides a {boostPercentage}% boost in votes for the linked Politikoz and has a chance to earn {adaReward} ADA if elected.
TicketProfile.next-race: One or more tickets are ready for the next election and have already been linked to a Politikoz.
TicketProfile.on-the-race: One or more tickets are currently participating in an election. If they win, they will generate ADA rewards.
TicketProfile.auto-link: This setting automatically links your available tickets to a Politikoz every election cycle.

Tokenomics.title: Meet $KOZ
Tokenomics.subtitle: A Utility Coin for Politikoz.io
Tokenomics.overview: The world of Koz will have a utility token with the sole purpose of boosting its internal economy, allowing the purchase of items such as political parties and party coalitions, bets for or against a Politikoz, and similar functions to be announced in due course.
Tokenomics.description: $KOZ is the utility token of the Politikoz.io ecosystem, created to drive the internal dynamics of the platform. It serves as a functional asset for engaging with governance systems, accessing exclusive features, and participating in in-game mechanisms, with its utility continuously evolving as new features are introduced.

notes.socialClaims: For future airdrop campaigns via X (Twitter), Discord, etc.
notes.liquidity: For DEX pairs and liquidity support

Treasury.overviewDescription: The Treasury is the core fund of the Politikoz project, used to reward election winners and support ecosystem initiatives. It is primarily accumulated through the rewards generated by our PLKOZ Stake Pool (Fixed Cost + Margin), which are 100% donated to the community. Additional income sources will be integrated into the platform in the future.
